about.title: About Me
about.name: Irfandi Iqbal Abimanyu
aboutMe: A full-stack web developer who enjoys detail-oriented programming, I always strive to write clean code that can be easily maintained. I have a passion for exploring new technologies, especially those that are trending in the web development industry, so that I can incorporate them into my projects.

I am a self-taught developer who constantly seeks to improve my skills through hands-on learning. I am comfortable working both independently and as part of a team. Currently, I am proficient in working with ExpressJS, ReactJS, NextJS, and Astro.
about.headline: Fullstack Web Developer

descriptions: Develop and modify CEISA 4.0 web application. A complex application for The Indonesian Directorate General of Customs and Excise that built on top React JS and RESTful API integrations. This application aims to provide optimal service in running the business integration and collaboration with service users.
points: Develop 2 modules with 3-4 menus each module.
Design 5 PDF docs template using React-PDF for 5 menus.
Implement React Ant Design for more than 10 pages in each menu.
Integrate complex RESTful APIs containing more than 2-3 dependencies using Axios.
Collaborate with Back-End Developer, QA, and Technical Writers seamlessly, reducing development time by 50%.

Implemented Git and Jira to streamline feature tracking and issue management for cross-functional development team, resulting in a 70% reduction in bug resolution time and increased collaboration efficiency.

descriptions: Designed and developed a professional language diagnostic test website, utilizing MongoDB, Next.js, and Express.js to create a feature-rich platform.
points: Implementing over 15 API endpoints to facilitate seamless communication between the front-end and back-end systems.
Designing and developing more than 10 responsive page layouts to ensure an optimal user experience across devices.
Creating and optimizing more than 5 database tables to efficiently store and retrieve data.
Integrating an email server for automated delivery of test results to users.
Collaborating with the Project Manager using Git and Discord for effective project management.
Integrating a secure payment gateway for smooth and secure transactions.

descriptions: Building a data collection and archiving web application for approximately 500 employees. The application is being developed using Tailwind, Express JS, React JS, and MongoDB. This implementation aims to improve the employee data management process by 60%.
Maintained a perfect GPA of 4.00/4.00 throughout my academic journey, showcasing my dedication and commitment to academic excellence.

For my diploma thesis, titled "Design And Build A Mobile-based Employee Management Information System at XYZ Company Using React Native Framework", I undertook a comprehensive project to develop an efficient and user-friendly employee management system.
To prepare for a career as a full-stack web developer, I have been actively exploring the latest programming materials that align with industry needs.

In addition, I have acquired various essential skills such as time management, self-development, public speaking, leadership, and work ethics. Furthermore, I have achieved mastery in several technical skills including HTML/CSS, JavaScript, Node.js, Express, React/Next, PostgreSQL, and the GitHub Workflow.

list.shortDesc: Indonesian Directorate General of Customs and Excise Apps
descriptions: This advanced application, built for the Indonesian Directorate General of Customs and Excise using React JS and RESTful API integrations, is designed to optimize service delivery by enhancing business integration and fostering effective collaboration with service users.

The Perizinan Module enables internal users to efficiently manage the registration of excise users by recording NPPBKC numbers, administering the delegation of power of attorney to excise user representatives, issuing personalization codes, handling deferred and periodic payments, and other functions.

Profdito is a platform used for conducting diagnostic tests on language skills, be it Indonesian, English, or other languages. Through this website, customers can obtain detailed information about their proficiency in a particular language. Profdito offers several key features, including the ability to purchase question packages, practice answering questions, and receive a language proficiency certificate tailored to the customer's desired language.

StaffLab is a website that can be used to manage staff and employees. Through this website, administrators can stay updated with the latest employee data, apply for job transfers, approve leave applications, and manage lists of branch offices, divisions, positions, and groups. StaffLab also supports the dark mode feature.

Warehouse is a simple website that can be used to manage product catalogs. This website features CRUD (Create, Read, Update, and Delete) functionality for managing products in the warehouse. It incorporates Google account login and applies a dark mode theme.

A lightweight and efficient RESTful API designed to manage book lists, built using the powerful Fiber framework and backed by a PostgreSQL database. This project leverages GORM as the ORM for seamless database interactions, ensuring a smooth and responsive experience for managing your book collections. Docker support is included to simplify development, making it easy to get started with minimal setup.
